Lit + React Hybrid + React Mode (Loader E2E)

This page loads the bundles produced by the Rspack integration fixture.

Run npm run build first so the loader code is compiled, then run npm run setup:wasm once so the real parser binding is available, followed by npm run build:fixture to emit dist/hybrid.js and dist/reactMode.js next to this HTML file (the Vitest e2e test also builds them into a temp directory). Serve this folder with any static server to view the demo.

Lit + React hybrid bundle

React-mode bundle

        npm run build
        npm run setup:wasm
        npm run build:fixture
        # use "npm run build:fixture -- --use-stub" if you explicitly want to bundle with the wasm stub
